FATEs_Unkown_060806_Shear-a-Yak_Desc:
Fire the aetheromatic clipper at the wooly yak, and gather up and deliver three sacks of fleece to Chirpy Chocobo.

[You must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land to play.]
Npcyell_11358_Text: Your task is to make stuffed toys using the materials laid out on the Mattock, kupo.
Npcyell_11359_Text: Once you've finished sewing together a toy, take it to a wain at the central plaza.
Npcyell_11360_Text: Make lots of stuffed toys and deliver them all, kupo!
Npcyell_11361_Text: We hope you enjoyed that veritable parade of oversized stuffed toys. The next fête is “Shear-a-Yak,” and it will be held at Bright Ballad's Passage!
Npcyell_11362_Text: Though you'll be shearing a yak in this fête, instead of shears, you'll be using an enhanced version of the aetheromatic auger: the aetheromatic clipper!
Npcyell_11363_Text: Tuned to operate with normal concentrations of aether, it shoots blasts of magicked wind that effortlessly removes fleece from their owners!
Npcyell_11364_Text: So get firing at the yak, and bring the fleece it sheds to me, three sacks full at a time!
Npcyell_11365_Text: That's all for “Shear-a-Yak.” Now, please take yourselves to the Abacus for the next fête: “Toy Hunter”!
Npcyell_11366_Text: My swinelings have hidden a lucky toy in one of three present boxes.
Npcyell_11367_Text: You must open the right box to find the toy, and then bring it to me.
Npcyell_11369_Text: Great hunting, everyone. Now, please make your way to the central plaza on the Mattock!
Npcyell_11370_Text: I bid you welcome to the final fête: “Presents of Mind”!
Npcyell_11371_Text: In this fête, you must deliver presents to various folk on the Mattock according to the mascots' instructions.
Npcyell_11372_Text: Upon delivering two presents, the mascot issuing the instructions will change, so be sure to pay attention. Let the gifting begin!
Npcyell_11373_Text: It's farewell for now, but we look forward to seeing you again! Till next time!
Npcyell_11383_Text: Thank you for your patience! The fête will now begin!
Npcyell_11387_Text: It's time to hide the toy.
Npcyell_11397_Text: The final fête is upon us. Are you ready, my dear mascots?
Npcyell_11401_Text: Let us finish on a high note!
Npcyell_11414_Text: Hear ye, hear ye! Fêtes are about to commence!
Npcyell_11415_Text: Greetings, friends, and thank you for joining in the Skyrise Celebration!
Npcyell_11418_Text: Today, we will be hosting a variety of fêtes─the first of which serves as an introduction to our friendly team of mascots.
Npcyell_11419_Text: Mighty Moogle, at your service, kupo. Made of sterner stuff though I am, I'm in charge of the fête “Made of Softer Stuff”!
Npcyell_11420_Text: Chirpy Chocobo is my name, and “Shear-a-Yak” is my game. Under my fluffy wing, you will shear as you've never shorn before!
Npcyell_11421_Text: And last but definitely not least, I am Perky Piggy. My swinelings and I look forward to making a “Toy Hunter” out of you!
Npcyell_11422_Text: Remember these mascots well, for they will be your guides throughout the revelry. On which note, let us dive into the fête!
Npcyell_11423_Text: The mascots will take turns striking their favorite poses, and we ask that you show your celebratory spirit by posing in kind.
Npcyell_11425_Text: Here is a pose that maximizes your muscular appeal.
Npcyell_11426_Text: Do the mighty maximizer, and show the fine specimen that you are, kupo!
Npcyell_11428_Text: Before using the aetheromatic clipper, it is important to point and acknowledge.
Npcyell_11429_Text: To that end, we do the chirpy checker!
Npcyell_11431_Text: When searching for treasure, one must keep one's eyes peeled.
Npcyell_11432_Text: To help you practice, I bid you do the perky peeler with me!
Npcyell_11434_Text: Hereon, the order will be random.
Npcyell_11435_Text: Before using the aetheromatic clipper, point and acknowledge with the chirpy checker!
Npcyell_11436_Text: When searching for treasure, keep your eyes peeled with the perky peeler!
Npcyell_11437_Text: Show the fine specimen that you are with the mighty maximizer, kupo!
Npcyell_11438_Text: I trust you are now acquainted with our friendly mascots. With that, let us move right along to the next fête.
Npcyell_11439_Text: Mighty Moogle, whose big muscles are equaled only by his big heart, awaits you on the Mattock for “Made of Softer Stuff”!
Npcyell_11880_Text: If you wish to participate in these light-hearted games, please gather at Bright Ballad's Passage.
Npcyell_11881_Text: Artisans of all persuasions can join in the fun and win fabulous prizes!
Npcyell_11882_Text: We eagerly look forward to your participation!
Npcyell_11883_Text: This is the final call for fêtes! If you wish to participate, please hasten to Bright Ballad's Passage.
Npcyell_11884_Text: Come, friends, pray do not dally!
Npcyell_11885_Text: Follow our mascots to the Mattock, where the fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will be held.
Npcyell_11886_Text: The fun and excitement have only just begun!
Npcyell_11887_Text: In charge of this fête is Chirpy Chocobo, who loves all things fluffy and downy.
Npcyell_11888_Text: Our mascots are making their way to the venue as we speak.
Npcyell_11889_Text: If you wish to participate─and surely you do─please follow them to Bright Ballad's Passage!
Npcyell_11890_Text: Quickly, now. As the saying goes, “Good things come to those who don't wait”!
Npcyell_11891_Text: This time, Perky Piggy and his lovable litter of swinelings will be in charge of the proceedings.
Npcyell_11892_Text: Including the soon-to-commence “Toy Hunter,” but two fêtes remain.
Npcyell_11893_Text: There, the fifth and final fête awaits: “Presents of Mind.”
Npcyell_11894_Text: This being the rousing conclusion, we hope to see every one of you there with bells on!
Npcyell_11895_Text: And that concludes all the fêtes. On behalf of all the residents of the Firmament, we thank you for joining us in the revelry.
Npcyell_11896_Text: The Skyrise Celebration is our way of honoring our esteemed builders while welcoming folk from near and far to our new home.
Npcyell_11897_Text: We hope that we have been able to give back some of the joy we have received, and wish you much and more happiness!
Npcyell_11940_Text: The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” is currently underway on the Mattock.
Npcyell_11941_Text: Don't miss this chance to craft adorably large stuffed toys!
Npcyell_11944_Text: Hurry, friends! Time is almost up!
Npcyell_11945_Text: The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will soon conclude.
Npcyell_11946_Text: If you still have a toy, please hurry and deliver it to the wain!
Npcyell_11947_Text: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
Npcyell_11949_Text: The fête “Shear-a-Yak” is currently being held at Bright Ballad's Passage. Join us in the fun and reap─or should I say, shear─the rewards!
Npcyell_11950_Text: I trust your clippers are firing well─our mascots are meticulous with their maintenance!
Npcyell_11951_Text: Lest you worry for your safety, I assure you our wooly friend has been rendered docile with a feast of his favorite fodder.
Npcyell_11953_Text: If you still have fleece, please hurry and deliver it to Chirpy Chocobo!
Npcyell_11954_Text: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
Npcyell_11955_Text: The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. Seek and you will find, participate and you will receive─prizes, that is!
Npcyell_11956_Text: The rules are simple: open the right present box to find the lucky toy, and see it to Perky Piggy's hands.
Npcyell_11957_Text: The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. It isn't too late to participate and receive prizes!
Npcyell_11958_Text: If you find yourself turned into a cute little piggy, fret not. The magick swiftly wears off.
Npcyell_11959_Text: The hunt is drawing to a close. How many lucky toys have you found thus far?
Npcyell_11960_Text: The fête “Toy Hunter” will soon conclude.
Npcyell_11961_Text: Loath though I am to disappoint, you can't take the lucky toys home with you. Please deliver them to Perky Piggy.
Npcyell_11962_Text: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
Npcyell_11963_Text: The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.
Npcyell_11964_Text: Take the presents the mascots have prepared, and see them delivered to the right people!
Npcyell_11965_Text: The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.
Npcyell_11966_Text: Such delight writ upon the faces of the recipients! Come, let's keep up the gift giving!
Npcyell_11967_Text: Hurry, friends! Not long now until the gift giving must come to an end!
Npcyell_11968_Text: The fête “Presents of Mind” will soon conclude.
Npcyell_11969_Text: Time is almost up, friends. Please deliver your last presents.
Npcyell_11970_Text: As today's excitement draws to a close, may we say what wonderful participants you have all been!
